title: Elegant Historic House with Modern Touches in Baluty
description: Step into a well-preserved historic house that radiates charm while providing today’s comforts. Featuring a classic brick façade, this residence boasts 4 spacious bedrooms and 3 elegant bathrooms over 197 sqm. Enjoy polished hardwood floors, expansive windows, and sensitive architectural restorations that honor the house’s character with tasteful updates throughout. Security and practicality are amply catered for with motion-sensor exterior lights, while the large underground garage offers superior convenience and safety for your vehicles.
neighborhood_description: Baluty strikes the perfect balance between old-world ambiance and the convenience of recent modern developments. This medium-urban neighborhood is known for its peaceful environment, excellent safety records, and new cycling paths woven through leafy avenues. Well-served by public transport and direct highway access, Baluty is both connected and offers a relaxed pace ideal for families and investors alike.
lifestyle_benefits: Safe, modern feel with historic character
Ideal for growing families or lucrative long-term rentals
Easy city commuting with stress-free highway & transit links
Inviting neighborhood for cycling & outdoor activities
target_buyer: Sophisticated property investors seeking a historically rich, easy-to-rent home in Lodz—and anyone desiring both classic ambiance and modern conveniences.
market_positioning: This property stands out for investors and families looking for a luxury house with solid historic charm in Baluty, priced mid-range for its space, location, and prime features, promising long-term value and rental stability in one of Lodz's rising neighborhoods.
